para: This option changes the time of all trackpoints. This might be useful if your track must be moved by one or more hours because of an incorrect time zone.

example.title: Time-shifting a track with the track filter
example.para: The following command line will shift all tracks to be one hour later.

para.userinput: gpsbabel -t -i gpx -f in.gpx -x track,move=+1h -o gpx -F out.gpx
